quote: Arise, awake and stop not till the goal is reached.
Death is not extinguishing the light; it is only putting out the lamp because the dawn has come.
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
He who can become mad with an idea, he alone sees light.
Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
The best revenge is massive success.
Without music, life would be a mistake.”,

quote.quote: Instinct is like ice, reason is the water, and inspiration is the subtlest form of vapour.
When I hear somebody sigh, ‘Life is hard,’ I am always tempted to ask, ‘Compared to what?’
When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
If not us, who? If not now, when?
The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong.
When the flower blooms, the bees come uninvited.
The first principle of true teaching is that nothing can be taught!
By plucking her petals you do not gather the beauty of the flower.
The greatest religion is to be true to your own future.
If you can change the situation, then what's the need for worry? If you cannot change the situation, then what's the use for worry?
The things I used to trip on, I walk over now!
If you love someone,set them free. If they come back, they're yours; if they don't, they never were!
Character is repeated habits, and repeated habits alone can reform character.
The biggest changes in a women's nature are brought by love; in man, by ambition
In order to see, you have to stop being in the middle of the picture.
